verbose_text: Considering now conditions characterized by higher oxygen chemical potential in the system, when Deltamu O = -0.55 eV (close to the bulk phase transformation to RhO 2), we find that the nanoparticle exposes only the Rh 2 O 3 (0001), Rh 2 O 3 (11 [combining macron] 02) and Rh 2 O 3 (112 [combining macron] 3) surfaces, with a high amount of Rh 2 O 3 (112 [combining macron] 3).
